title: A necessary instruction of christian faith and hope for Christians to holde fast, and to be bolde vp on the promise of God, & not to doubt of their saluation in Christ. Translated out of D. Vrbanus Regius, into English and newly recognized by Iohn F.
author: Rhegius, Urbanus, 1489-1541.
publisher: By Hugh Singleton, dvvelling in Crede Lane, at the signe of the gylden Tunne, nere vnto Ludgate, and are there to be sold,
notes: A translation, by John Foxe, of the original by Urbanus Rhegius.
First translated c. 1548 with title: An instruccyon of christen fayth.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
